alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 8:37AM CDT until March 27 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Laclede County. .Heavy rainfall in the upper portion of the Gasconade River Basin has led to rises around flood stage at Hazelgreen. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Hazelgreen. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, moderate flooding begins at the gage site. Flood waters impacts the old State Highway 66 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
